name: Marina View Hotel Apartments

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here in Feb 2012 and found its location to be quite convenient.
reviews.title: Convenient location foor the beach and the Metro, and reasonably priced.

reviews.text: The hotel is about 30 min drive from the airport.
reviews.title: Basic and affordable option

reviews.text: The nearest Metro station (Dubai Marina) is 5 to 10 min walk, and the trains are frequent, comfortable and cheap. At the time of writing 15DHMS lets you travel all day. All trains and stations are air conditioned.
reviews.title: Can't knock it...

reviews.text: The nearest free beach is 15 to 20 min walk. It's gently sloping so safe for poor swimmers and it's clean, but there are no showers, toilets, sun loungers or sun umbrellas there, so take your own if you can !
reviews.title: A home away from home!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are supermarkets and decent Pizza outlets within 5 minutes walk.
reviews.title: Room for improvement - but definitely worth considering.

reviews.text: Stayed at these apartments March 12. Cant fault the location perfect for Jumeirah beach residence and the marina is only a few minutes away so we loved the location. Also the metro station is a few minutes walk too. Rooms were spacious enough, we had a studio room perfect size decent size bathroom too. And the kitchen area was decent.
reviews.title: Unhelpful staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool was good, always found it to be quiet not too busy so great to get some peace and quiet.
reviews.title: Excellent value - great location

reviews.text: Room service is not the best not really worth trying unless you have no other option!
reviews.title: Sub-standard for Dubai

reviews.text: I would recommend the short walk to marina walk where there are plenty of nice restaurants. Or Jumeirah beach residence is also a short walk or a 5 min taxi ride away.
reviews.title: Great value for money

reviews.text: The one thing which ruined this hotel for us is the staff. We asked for extra towels and were told we were ony allowed two since there was two of us. We asked for an extra room key since sometimes my friend and I wanted to go to different places or come back at different times. First we were told they did not have any extra keys to come back tomorrow. When we did come back we were told we were only allowed one key. This was very inconveniant and I have never come across this at any hotel I have stayed at. They are very unhelpful with any requests so just dont bother. Esp a gentleman called Michael who we found to be very condescending and plain rude. If it wasnt for the staff we would definately stay here again as its a nice hotel and perfect location however we have been completely put off by the rude and unhelpful front desk staff. We generally felt very unwelcome.
reviews.title: Excellent value in the city of five stars

description: Welcome to the Marina View Hotel It means a warm welcome, a unique holiday experience and a sophisticated style of living. A hospitality company engaged in the operation, ownership, development, and redevelopment of hotels in gateway cities and resort markets.The Company aims to develop properties to the highest standards of design and comfort in the Gulf Region. Marina View prides itself in exceeding customer expectations and is dedicated to setting a new standard in the hospitality industry. It achieves this by recruiting, training and retaining the best quality staff available. Marina View Hotel ranges from homely to luxurious, but you can always be assured of generous hospitality.
